ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Trakanon has been speculated on as the BP dropping mob for Kunark armor since the first time Venril was killed and dropped a few sets of legs (as many know).
ygData.messageBody:
Trakanon has been speculated on as the BP dropping mob for Kunark armor
since the first time Venril was killed and dropped a few sets of legs (as
many know). Well, I certainly doubt this bard armor drop has ANYTHING to do
with the recent patch. Someone was bound to bring up this coincidence sooner
or later tho. The bottom line is we still don't have our damn bracers and
arms. Just tonight FoH took Trak out a second time. He dropped a shaman and
SK breastplate, as well as the teeth yada yada yada. They'll be hitting
Veeshan's Peak before long, and from the kinds of drops we're seeing outside
of that place, I will die laughing if VP loots turn out to be as much of a
joke as PoS. Watch EQ get patched and FoH enters VP only to find our Singing
Steele Vambracers. Must've been that last patch, right?

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
perma-54th Bard, Veeshan


>From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Armor
>Date: Tue, 20 Jun 2000 09:41:36 -0400
>
>Heh and to clarify further:
>
>It was dropped by a Dragon which had never been killed before on _any_
>server.
>
>**looks around for the guys in black suits with mirrored shades**
>
>SHH!!! They're all after me!
>
>
> > em listens for the sound of Black Helicopters(tm)....
> >
> > Well, not exactly "found" on a server. Afaik, it was dropped in the
>first
> > kill of Trakanon - the poison dragon when Fires of Heaven took him down
> > early this weekend. Not like "finding" a foraged item or a bag on the
> > ground in the woods.
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> > > A patch goes on the server. THEN a Singing Breatplate is found on a
> > > server.
> >
>
>
